content: Lifestyle Asked by Tee-Ming ChewAsked on 01 Nov 2018What are some of the online services or apps that you actually paid to use?3 answersAnswerBump1
Answers (3)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Gabriel LeeLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 07 Jun 2019Used to pay for Spotify's monthly subscription at $9.90 per month to skip the annoying advertisements and play the songs that I want to hear, especially when I travel overseas so that I can download the songs and listen offline while I'm on the plane. Now, I'm back to using the free version and will only pay for Premium again when I'm going to travel overseas. 1 comment2
Tee-Ming Chew02 Nov 2018Should consider getting the family plan and share the cost with your family! I'm technically paying less than $9.90 now!

Yong Kah HweeLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 07 Jun 2019I pay for the Spotify family plan! $2.50 per month, which is very manageable IMO. I don't pay for any other online services/apps. Except maybe on ebooks!1 comment1
Tee-Ming Chew02 Nov 2018I just subscribed to Blinkist recently for book summaries! Highly recommend it!
Xinyi LumLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 02 Nov 2018I'm (sadly) paying for iCloud and Google Drive storage )::::: 0 comments0
